dependencies.notes: Consider Azure Spring Apps service registry as alternative

issues.title: External Configuration Server Dependency
issues.description: Application relies on external Spring Cloud Config Server for configuration management
issues.recommendation: Migrate to Azure App Configuration or Azure Key Vault for centralized configuration management in Azure Spring Apps

issues.title: Netflix Eureka Service Discovery
issues.description: Application uses Netflix Eureka for service discovery, which requires additional infrastructure
issues.recommendation: Use Azure Spring Apps built-in service registry instead of external Eureka server

issues.title: Database Connection Configuration
issues.description: Application configured for Azure MySQL but may need connection string updates for managed services
issues.recommendation: Verify Azure MySQL Flexible Server connection configuration and consider using managed identity for authentication

issues.title: Local In-Memory Caching
issues.description: Application uses local Caffeine cache which won't be shared across instances
issues.recommendation: Consider Azure Cache for Redis for distributed caching in multi-instance deployments

issues.title: Prometheus Metrics Endpoint
issues.description: Application exports Prometheus metrics which may not be directly used in Azure
issues.recommendation: Azure Monitor and Application Insights can collect Spring Boot Actuator metrics. Prometheus endpoint can be kept for compatibility

issues.title: Chaos Monkey Enabled
issues.description: Chaos Monkey library is included for resilience testing
issues.recommendation: Ensure chaos engineering is properly configured and only enabled in non-production environments

issues.title: Stateless Application Design
issues.description: Application appears to be stateless and follows 12-factor app principles
issues.recommendation: This is a positive finding. Application is well-suited for cloud deployment with horizontal scaling

issues.title: Health and Readiness Probes
issues.description: Spring Boot Actuator endpoints available for health checks
issues.recommendation: Configure Kubernetes liveness and readiness probes using /actuator/health endpoints

keyActions: Replace Spring Cloud Config Server with Azure App Configuration
Use Azure Spring Apps built-in service registry instead of Eureka
Configure managed identity for Azure MySQL authentication
Consider Azure Cache for Redis for distributed caching
Enable Azure Monitor and Application Insights integration

strengths: Stateless design suitable for horizontal scaling
RESTful API with clear endpoint structure
Health check endpoints via Spring Boot Actuator
improvements: Migrate from Netflix OSS components to Azure-native services
Implement distributed caching for multi-instance scenarios
Add comprehensive logging strategy for cloud environments
Consider implementing circuit breakers with Resilience4j

phases.name: Configuration Migration
tasks: Set up Azure App Configuration service
Migrate configuration from Config Server to Azure App Configuration
Update application to use Azure App Configuration client

phases.name: Service Discovery Migration
tasks: Configure Azure Spring Apps service registry

phases.name: Database and Caching Optimization
tasks: Configure Azure MySQL connection with managed identity
Evaluate and implement Azure Cache for Redis if needed
Test database connectivity and caching behavior
